scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w webhook-service" "npm run dev -w dashboard" "npm run dev -w delivery-worker"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w webhook-service && npm run build -w delivery-worker && npm run build -w dashboard
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ts
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --fix || echo '⚠️ ESLint fixed what it could'
scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,md}" || echo '⚠️ Prettier will be configured in next phase'
scripts.format:check: prettier --check "**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,md}" || echo '⚠️ Prettier will be configured in next phase'
scripts.test:cli: cd cli && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest
